original_title: Special traffic plan in view of ‘Dharma Rashmi’ Poson zone in Homagama
original_body_lines: A special traffic plan will be made effective in and around Homagama in view of the ‘Dharma Rashmi’ Poson zone which is scheduled to be inaugurated on Saturday (June 03), the police media division announced today.

This Poson zone will be held between 6.00 p.m. and 12.00 a.m. from Saturday to Monday (June 05), covering the Homagama town, Homagama railway junction, Pitipana junction, the road in front of Panagoda army camp, Godagama junction and the Mahinda Rajapaksa Vidyalaya playground.
Accordingly, the following traffic plan will be implemented during the course of the Poson zone:
